GSD.product_version: versions from v4.11 to before v5.4.220
GSD.description:
usb: gadget: function: fix dangling pnp_string in f_printer.c

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.220 by commit 9fe0a8c0694cdee35b617ad5035aa1f080f4af55, it was introduced in version v4.11 by commit fdc01cc286be9d32140631469b7608f3f58c2db3. For more details please see the references link.
